alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 12:51PM EST until December 22 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The water reaches businesses on the low side of Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Wed 12 pm: 9.2 Forecast: Wed 1 pm 9.2 Wed 7 pm 9.0 Thu 1 am 8.8 Thu 7 am 8.6 Thu 1 pm 8.4 Thu 7 pm 8.1 Fri 1 am 7.8 Fri 7 am 7.6 Fri 1 pm 7.4 Fri 7 pm 7.2 Sat 1 am 6.9 Sat 7 am 6.7 &&
